blogPost.excerpt: Text Compare lets you instantly see the difference between two pieces of text. Compare text by paragraph, word or character. Paste in two pieces of text, and Text Compare will highlight what has been inserted in, or deleted from, the original text.
blogPost.body: Text Compare lets you instantly see the difference between two pieces of text. Compare text by paragraph, word or character. Paste in two pieces of text, and Text Compare will highlight what has been inserted in, or deleted from, the original text.
blogPost.title: Text Compare - Instantly see the difference between two pieces of text
blogPost.author: Alastair Byrne

localize.description: 文本比较可以让你立即看到两段文本之间的差异。按段落、单词或字符来比较文本。粘贴两段文字，Text Compare将突出显示在原文中插入或删除的内容。
localize.tagline: 瞬间看到两段文字之间的差别

localize.description: 文本比較可以讓你立即看到兩段文本之間的差異。按段落、單詞或字符來比較文本。粘貼兩段文字，Text Compare將突出顯示在原文中插入或刪除的內容。
localize.tagline: 瞬間看到兩段文字之間的差別

previous.excerpt: I was getting tired of waiting for uploads to convert mywebm files tomp4 files. That's why I made WEBM To MP4! There's no ads, no uploads, and no watermarks. Just select your local file, convert, & download! 🤯
previous.title: WEBM To MP4 - Convert .webm files to .mp4 files without uploading them

localize.description: 我越来越累了，等待上传转换我的WEBM文件TMP4文件。这就是为什么我做了WEBM到MP4！没有广告，没有上传，也没有水印。没有广告，没有上传，也没有水印。只需选择你的本地文件，转换，下载! 🤯
localize.tagline: 将webm文件转换为mp4文件，无需上传。

localize.description: 我越來越累了，等待上傳轉換我的WEBM文件TMP4文件。這就是爲什麼我做了WEBM到MP4！沒有廣告，沒有上傳，也沒有水印。沒有廣告，沒有上傳，也沒有水印。只需選擇你的本地文件，轉換，下載! 🤯
localize.tagline: 將webm文件轉換爲mp4文件，無需上傳。

next.excerpt: Turn your code in to beautifully images. Choose from a range of syntax colors, hide or show the background, and toggle between a dark and light window. Use keyboard shortcuts to speed up your process. Built by the team at Raycast.
next.title: Ray.so by Raycast - Create beautiful images of your code

localize.description: 将你的代码变成精美的图片。从一系列的语法颜色中选择，隐藏或显示背景，并在明暗窗口之间切换。使用键盘快捷键来加快你的进程。由Raycast团队打造。
localize.tagline: 为您的代码创建美丽的图像

localize.description: 將你的代碼變成精美的圖片。從一系列的語法顏色中選擇，隱藏或顯示背景，並在明暗窗口之間切換。使用鍵盤快捷鍵來加快你的進程。由Raycast團隊打造。
localize.tagline: 爲您的代碼創建美麗的圖像
